item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 3:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Llama 3.1 405B now runs at 969 tokens/s on Cerebras Inference (92 points | 28 comments)
2. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (370 points | 210 comments)
3. Maslow 4: Large format CNC routing made accessible (23 points | 6 comments)
4. Show HN: FastGraphRAG – Better RAG using good old PageRank (240 points | 64 comments)
5. 20 years of Google Scholar (203 points | 106 comments)
6. Show HN: Venmo Unofficial API (58 points | 28 comments)
7. MailCatcher runs a super simple SMTP server (167 points | 63 comments)
8. A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor (223 points | 88 comments)
9. Hyperfine: A command-line benchmarking tool (37 points | 1 comment)
10. Air traffic failure caused by two locations 3600nm apart sharing 3-letter code (178 points | 176 comments)
11. The Skyline algorithm for packing 2D rectangles (148 points | 36 comments)
12. Playful, intricate Japanese leaf art – in pictures – Art and design (18 points | discuss)
13. Two undersea cables in Baltic Sea disrupted (152 points | 352 comments)
14. Histogramming Bytes with Positional Popcount (18 points | discuss)
15. Show HN: Tips.io – A Tailwind playground with AI, page management, and theming (208 points | 48 comments)
16. Waiting for many things at once with io_uring (77 points | 17 comments)
17. Bird brain from the age of dinosaurs reveals roots of avian intelligence (94 points | 5 comments)
18. Reactive HTML Notebooks (304 points | 47 comments)
19. Trieve (YC W24) Is Hiring a software engineer to build OpenAPI tooling ( | hide)
20. $8k Suzuki from India Received a 5-Star Crash Test Rating (43 points | 19 comments)
21. Is Chrome the New IE? (2023) (203 points | 229 comments)
22. Rats Learned to Drive–and They Love It (4 points | discuss)
23. Towards Nyquist Learners (52 points | 28 comments)
24. LLaVA-O1: Let Vision Language Models Reason Step-by-Step (143 points | 25 comments)
25. End-to-End Tour of Text Layout/Rendering (2015) (27 points | 4 comments)
26. Against Best Practices (216 points | 173 comments)
27. A programmable FPGA SoM in the tiny microSD form factor (72 points | 26 comments)
28. AMD now has more compute on the top 500 than Nvidia (143 points | 84 comments)
29. JGS ASCII ART gallery (2001) (16 points | 2 comments)
30. DNA testing company vanishes along with its customers' genetic data (82 points | 22 comments)
